definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: The direction of light reflected from an object depends on its alignment.
sentences.chinese: 光線的方向會根據對象的位置發生反射。

sentences.english: Through the dark robe oft amber rays prevail.
sentences.chinese: 琥珀色光線穿過黑袍而透射。

sentences.english: The more dye molecules there are, the more light is lost.
sentences.chinese: 當板上的色塊分子越多，光線的散失就厲害。

sentences.english: Its pale rays fled out on either hand; beautiful but grim was the vision they disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 微弱的光線向兩旁流瀉而出，照出的景象美麗而陰森。

sentences.english: They chose this gene because it is easy to see with a florescent light.
sentences.chinese: 他們選擇了這種基因，因爲它很容易看到與熒光光線。

sentences.english: Light can be trusted to curve only in a vertical plane.
sentences.chinese: 可確信光線僅在垂直面內作曲線傳播。

sentences.english: When the packages are opened the warmth and light wakes them and they fly out.
sentences.chinese: 包裝打開之後，被暖意和光線催醒的蝴蝶就會飛出來。

sentences.english: This is sunlight refracted through our atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 這些是從地球大氣層中折射出的光線。

sentences.english: He snuffs out candle by his place, light fades out.
sentences.chinese: 他熄滅他身旁的蠟燭，光線漸暗。
我們有各種各樣的光線。

sentences.english: This method can be simply applied to GPU-based 3D texture ray-casting algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 並結合基於3D紋理的GPU光線投射算法完成繪製。

sentences.english: Its rays are converged on a point.
They don’t mind being root-bound and can handle medium light.
sentences.chinese: 他們不介意生根滿盆，也能再光線一般的地方生長。

sentences.english: In the dim light of the daybreak, I saw a dark shape looming athwart the door.
sentences.chinese: 在拂曉前昏暗的光線中，我看到一個黑影擋在門口。

sentences.english: It had three large bright lights lighting up the sky underneath it.
sentences.chinese: 它下面有三束很大的明亮光線照亮着天空。

definition: scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
